name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 雪柳桃子
summary:
身体測定の日。校内でも１、２を争う美人の
雪柳桃子が診察にやってきた
--
In the day of healthy check, one of the most beautiful girl of entire school, MOMOKO came for an ausculatation. Because this is really rare case, please try your best not upseting her to anjoy your MOLEST!

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
